Class ExpiringSessionRecycler

    IoSessionRecycler

    public class ExpiringSessionRecycler
extends Object
implements IoSessionRecycler
    An IoSessionRecycler with sessions that time out on inactivity. TODO Document me.

    Apache MINA Project
